entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:14 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 1:53 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: ENE 26 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets near noon then to rain showers this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 this evening. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
